snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown and state legislative leaders reached a deal to place a revised plan for a rainy-day fund on the ballot this fall; it would create a cushion against future economic downturns and allow the state to use extra cash to pay down...
abstract: California Gov Jerry Brown and state legislative leaders reach deal to place revised plan for a rainy-day fund on the ballot; it would create cushion against future economic downturns and allow state to use extra cash to pay down long-term debt.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown and state legislative leaders reached a deal to place a revised plan for a rainy-day fund on the ballot this fall; it would create a cushion against future economic downturns and allow the state to use extra cash to pay down long-term debt.

headline.main: California: Agreement on Rainy Day Fund
headline.print_headline: California: Agreement on Rainy Day Fund
